title: The Wonderland in Alice
description: Alice Queensbury has been living a difficult life with her oppressive mother, the Queen of Hearts Advertising president herself, Margaret. Between working for her and taking care of her sick father, the only way Alice can escape is by going to the Wonderland in her mind, a world she created all on her own since she was nine years old but what happens when reality catches up to Alice? How much longer can she live in her imaginary world before reality sinks in once and for all?
author: S.T. Jones
